Cite.definition: to demand the appearance of in court
Cite.origin: [Latin citare to rouse, call on, summon]

1.definition: to demand the appearance of in courtserve with a citation [had beenfor contempt] [you are herebyto show cause in the Probate Court]
1.cited: to show cause in the Probate Court]

2.definition: to quote or refer to as a precedent or authority [the plaintiffseveral cases for the proposition]
